about_the_game:
Kalnazar is a massively multiplayer online game. Play as adventurers and explore the new world, or become a gladiator and fight other players in arenas or battlefields.

Explore a new world: A story with missions to complete alone or with others. Dungeons to clear with a group (5 players) to collect equipment, with multiple difficulty levels. You can also participate in raids with a group (10 players) to eradicate the greatest threats in this world.

Show your worth: Competitive arenas with a ranking system and unique rewards every 6 months. Arenas with various formats: 1v1, 2v2, 3v3. You can also let loose with others in battlefields.

Multiple classes and races available: In this world, you can play as various classes: Warrior, Priest, Mage, Inquisitor, Rogue, Demon, through several races: Human, Sun Elf, Demon, Night Elf.

Adventurer or Gladiator: When creating your character, you can choose to be an adventurer who can do everything, but you'll start at level 1, or you can choose to be a gladiator. You'll start at the maximum level with all skills unlocked, but this character can only participate in player-versus-player combat and cannot leave their city.

A world in evolution: There will be regular updates to balance and add content to the game.

Subscription: When you purchase the game, you will receive one month of free subscription. Once it expires, you will be offered the option to renew it in-game through a Steam microtransaction. The purpose of this subscription is to support the game's maintenance and evolution. The price will not exceed $5 per month and may be reduced if you subscribe for a longer period.

name: Kalnazar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT or AMD ATI Radeon HD 3800 (or equivalent)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 at 2.8 GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 at 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon RX 470 (or equivalent)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: Kalnazar is a massively multiplayer online game. Play as adventurers and explore the new world, or become a gladiator and fight other players in arenas or battlefields.
